I am an Obico Pro Plan subscriber. Am I: I am an Obico Pro Plan subscriber. Am I eligible for a discount on the Unlimited Plan?
Yes! You'll receive 30% off the Unlimite: Yes! You'll receive 30% off the Unlimited Plan. By the way, thank you for supporting the Obico project! üòä
I'm an Obico Pro Plan subscriber. Why do: I'm an Obico Pro Plan subscriber. Why don't I see the 30% discount?
First, make sure you're signed into the: First, make sure you're signed into the Obico account with an active Pro subscription. If you still don't see the discount on this page, it should appear at checkout. If it doesn't show up there either, please contact us at support@obico.io for assistance.
Am I able to cancel the Unlimited Plan?: Am I able to cancel the Unlimited Plan?
Yes, you can cancel at any time by click: Yes, you can cancel at any time by clicking 'Downgrade to Free.'
What happens after I downgrade to the Fr: What happens after I downgrade to the Free plan?
Your Unlimited Plan won't renew when you: Your Unlimited Plan won't renew when your current term ends, and your account won't be charged. You'll still have access to unlimited AI credits until the end of your current term.
Can I get a refund for the Unlimited Pla: Can I get a refund for the Unlimited Plan?
By default, no. This is to prevent abuse: By default, no. This is to prevent abuse, as processing refunds incurs significant fees that we're unable to absorb.
Is it possible to request an exception f: Is it possible to request an exception for a refund?
We handle these requests on a case-by-ca: We handle these requests on a case-by-case basis. You can contact support@obico.io to request an exception and provide your reason for the request.
